page.title: 07THE A.A. IN WEST THURROCK
page.content: The first of three Automobile Association transport depots on the M25 moterway has been opened at the Lakeside Development.It is handling over 25,000 jobs a year. The depot has cost Â£1 million to set up and it is the home base for 60 patrol vehicles and 30 other types of vehicles on the site. The site is two and a half acres.It has eight workshop bays,storage space for 12,000 gallons of diesel fuel and a covered vehicle wash area. The accomodation provides modern staff facilities,a members'lounge and training rooms.Also at the depot there is a department providing special A.A. signs.The A.A. will come and take you home if your car breaks down as well as tow your car away if they can't mend it.
